title: Subscribing to YouTube Channels: Mobile & Desktop Guide

steps.title: Open the YouTube app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Open the YouTube app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. It's the red rectangle icon with a white triangle inside. You'll find it on the home screen, in the app list, or by searching.

steps.title: Sign in to your Google account.
steps.content: Sign in to your Google account. If you're not signed in to YouTube, you'll need to do so before you can subscribe to a YouTube channel. On Android, you'll automatically be logged in to the Google account linked to your phone or tablet. On iPhone or iPad, tap the profile icon at the top-right corner. If you're signed in, you'll see your account info. If not, tap SIGN IN to log in now.

steps.title: Go to the channel you want to subscribe to.
steps.content: Go to the channel you want to subscribe to. You can subscribe to a channel from its home page or any of its videos. To search, tap the magnifying glass at the top of YouTube, enter the name of the channel or one of its videos, and then tap the search key. If the channel name appears, tap it now. If you searched for a video, tap the video's name.

steps.title: Tap the Subscribe button.
steps.content: Tap the Subscribe button. You'll see this oval button below the channel's name. Once tapped, the button will change to "Subscribed." If you're subscribing from a video, you'll need to scroll down below the video to find the channel's name and the Subscribe button. When you subscribe to a channel, the text on the "SUBSCRIBE" button will change to "SUBSCRIBED." You can unsubscribe at any time by tapping this button on any of the channel's videos or its home page and selecting Unsubscribe .

steps.title: Tap the Subscriptions tab to view your subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap the Subscriptions tab to view your subscriptions. You'll see this tab at the bottom of the YouTube app. This displays a selection of videos from channels you're subscribed to.

steps.title: Tap All to manage your subscriptions.
steps.content: Tap All to manage your subscriptions. From here, you can manage your notifications and unsubscribe from channels. Tap the bell icon next to a channel to view your options. If you want to receive notifications each time the channel shares new content, select All . If you receive too many notifications, tap Personalized or None instead. To unsubscribe, tap Unsubscribe at the bottom.

steps.title: Change more notification preferences.
steps.content: Change more notification preferences. If you want to change how you receive notifications for the channels you subscribe to, it's easy: Tap your profile photo or initial at the top-right and select Settings . Tap Notifications . To enable or disable YouTube channel subscription notifications entirely, toggle the "Subscriptions" slider. You can also tap Channel settings here to manage your notifications for each channel individually.

steps.title: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://www.youtube.com in a web browser. This opens the YouTube website.

steps.title: Sign in to your account.
steps.content: Sign in to your account. You must be signed in to a Google account to subscribe to YouTube channels. If you're not signed in, click the blue "Sign In" button at the top-right corner and log in with your Google account. If you don't have a Google account, you can create one easily . If you're already signed in and want to switch accounts, click the profile photo at the top-right corner and select Switch account . Then, click another account in the list, or click Add account to sign in to a different account.

steps.title: Search for a channel.
steps.content: Search for a channel. You can check out what's Trending in the left panel, search for a particular channel, or find something new by searching for keywords. If you know the name of the YouTube Channel you want to subscribe to, type it into the search bar at the top of YouTube and press Enter or Return . To see just channels, click Filters at the top-right corner of the search results and select Channel under "Type." You can also subscribe to a channel from any of the channel's videos. Type the name of a video into the search bar and press Enter or Return . Then, click a video to start watching itâ€”the channel's name will appear below the video's title.

steps.title: Click the Subscribe button.
steps.content: Click the Subscribe button. You'll see this oval button in the upper-right area of the channel's home page or below one of the channel's videos. Now that you're subscribed, the "Subscribe" button will turn gray and change to SUBSCRIBED . You can click the button at any time and select Unsubscribe if you don't want to be subscribed to this channel anymore.

steps.title: Click Subscriptions to see videos from your subscribed channels.
steps.content: Click Subscriptions to see videos from your subscribed channels. If you don't see this tab on the left side of YouTube, click the three-line menu at the upper-left corner first. This displays a selection of videos from all of the channels you're subscribed to, though you'll need to do one more thing to see a list of your YouTube subscriptions .

steps.title: Click Manage to manage your subscriptions.
steps.content: Click Manage to manage your subscriptions. You'll see this option at the top-right corner of the Subscriptions page. If you want to change your subscription notifications or unsubscribe from a channel, you can do so easily from this page: Next to each channel, you'll see a menu icon that says "Subscribed." Click Subscribed next to a channel to view your notification and subscription preferences. If you want to receive notifications each time the channel shares new content, click All . If you get too many notifications for this channel, select Personalized or None instead. To unsubscribe, click Unsubscribe at the bottom of the menu.

steps.title: Change more notification preferences.
steps.content: Change more notification preferences. If you want to change how you receive channel notifications, it's easy: Click your profile photo or initial at the top-right. Click Settings . Click Notifications . To enable or disable YouTube channel subscription notifications entirely, toggle the "Subscriptions" switch at the top. If you want to receive an email when your subscribed channels share new content, toggle on the "Permission" switch at the bottom of the page.
